languages.text: "Вы — просто бойцовые животные, во сколько слоев высокопарной ерунды это не оберни".
"Wrap it up in lofty drivel if you like, but, in the end, you are animals kept for blood sport."
languages.original_text: "Вы — просто бойцовые животные, во сколько слоев высокопарной ерунды это не оберни".

traits.locale_text: "Wrap it up in lofty drivel if you like, but, in the end, you are animals kept for blood sport."
"Wrap it up in lofty drivel if you like, but, in the end, you are animals kept for blood sport."
"Wrap it up in lofty drivel if you like, but, in the end, you are animals kept for blood sport."
"Wrap it up in lofty drivel if you like, but, in the end, you are animals kept for blood sport."

languages.text: “尽管说漂亮话吧。到头来，你们不过是为了血腥的杀戮而饲养的牲畜罢了。”
languages.original_text: "Wrap it up in lofty drivel if you like, but, in the end, you are animals kept for blood sport."

traits.locale_text: “尽管说漂亮话吧。到头来，你们不过是为了血腥的杀戮而饲养的牲畜罢了。”

languages.text: «Decora las cosas como quieras, pero en el fondo no sois más que animales preparados para una matanza como espectáculo».
languages.original_text: "Wrap it up in lofty drivel if you like, but, in the end, you are animals kept for blood sport."

traits.locale_text: «Decora las cosas como quieras, pero en el fondo no sois más que animales preparados para una matanza como espectáculo».

languages.text: 「口ではいくらでも繕えるが、結局は血の娯楽のために飼われている動物だ」
languages.original_text: "Wrap it up in lofty drivel if you like, but, in the end, you are animals kept for blood sport."

traits.locale_text: 「口ではいくらでも繕えるが、結局は血の娯楽のために飼われている動物だ」

languages.text: "Verpackt es ruhig in erhabenes Geschwätz, doch letztlich seid Ihr alle nur Tiere, die für die Jagd gehalten werden."
languages.original_text: "Wrap it up in lofty drivel if you like, but, in the end, you are animals kept for blood sport."

traits.locale_text: "Verpackt es ruhig in erhabenes Geschwätz, doch letztlich seid Ihr alle nur Tiere, die für die Jagd gehalten werden."

languages.text: « Vous pouvez bien le présenter comme vous voulez, mais vous n'êtes rien de plus que des animaux élevés pour le combat. »
languages.original_text: "Wrap it up in lofty drivel if you like, but, in the end, you are animals kept for blood sport."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez bien le présenter comme vous voulez, mais vous n'êtes rien de plus que des animaux élevés pour le combat. »

languages.text: "Dilediğin kadar zırvala. Nihayetinde kan sporu için beslenen hayvanlardan farkınız yok."
languages.original_text: "Wrap it up in lofty drivel if you like, but, in the end, you are animals kept for blood sport."

traits.locale_text: "Dilediğin kadar zırvala. Nihayetinde kan sporu için beslenen hayvanlardan farkınız yok."
